content: Break Out Room Schedule is Posted with locations TBD until we get the room names. Go here to reserve your room: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Th0-qhD4u5XTrFt7QeK25xeHxrbC5sF4AU4VTdGxaj0/edit#gid=477899808
Thanks, Sandy! Do you know when we'll have information on the capacities for the room options?
Hey Guys, I'm claiming Sat Q1 for FHIRcast. Do we know what the rooms names are yet? We can likely put FHIRcast in the smaller of the rooms.

I've added "Terminology Services Support for SNOMED CT" at 10:00 AM on Saturday (following FHIRcast). We want to reach out to as many of the tracks as we can (including FHIRcast), as we think that most people/projects have a need for using SNOMED CT in some capacity.

Cross Organization Application Access will have a breakout session at 11 am on Saturday. This is a technical overview and Q&A and will discuss the use of Unified Data Access Profiles in dynamic client registration and JWT-based authentication, with trusted certificates. Another breakout session is scheduled for policy related discussion at 1pm Sunday (certificate attributes, etc.).

On Saturday at 5PM, @Dave deBronkart and I will discuss the Patient Innovator Track at DevDays (https://www.devdays.com/amsterdam/patient-track/). If you have ideas on how to enhance patient involvement in the FHIR community and how to reach out to data literate patients, please join us for a discussion in room M 103.
